hero.name: Nancy
hero.subtitle: Software engineer by training, lifelong learner at heart.

intro.paragraph1: I love turning technology into meaningful, human-centered solutions.
intro.paragraph2: I'm currently on a career break, using the time to reset, explore, and grow. Previously, I worked at <microsoft>Microsoft</microsoft> building education products for classrooms around the world. When I'm not tinkering or learning something new, you'll find me <skiing>skiing</skiing>, on a <tennis>tennis court</tennis>, or planning my next <travel>travel adventure</travel>.

items.title: OneNote Class Notebook
items.description: OneNote for the classroom, built for collaboration and sharing materials and assignments

items.title: Reading Coach
items.description: AI-powered personalized reading practice for every student

items.title: Search Progress
items.description: Information literacy training that helps students craft effective search queries and evaluate results with confidence

items.title: School Connection Private Preview
items.description: Provides parents and guardians with clear visibility into their child's academic progress

items.title: Dash
items.description: Edge extension that lets users train an AI agent to perform personalized tasks online

items.title: Windows Web Account Manager
items.description: OS component enabling cloud identity experiences on every Windows device

items.title: Natural Authentication
items.description: Internship project to extend the Windows Natural Authentication service to leverage additional signals

items.title: "Pebbles" Kernel
items.description: Simple UNIX-like operating system built from scratch

items.title: Wikipedia Q&A
items.description: Natural language system for question & answer generation based on a given Wikipedia article

items.title: Dynamic Lock
items.description: Internship project to prototype a Windows auto-locking mechanism when you walk away with your paired Bluetooth device

items.title: Surroundify
items.description: Hackathon project to synchronously stream music across devices

footer.credit: Designed using <figma>Figma AI</figma>, built with <nextjs>Next.js</nextjs> and <tailwind>Tailwind CSS</tailwind> in <vscode>Visual Studio Code</vscode>, with the help of <claude>Claude Code</claude>.
